adb.unauthorized_hint: On the tablet, check the box on the left of the USB debugging prompt and tap ALLOW.
app.language_invalid: Invalid selection. Please enter a valid number.
app.menu.back_to_menu: Press ENTER to return to the main menu.
app.menu.invalid_choice: Invalid input. Please enter a valid value.
app.title: [LPMBox] PRC(CN) / ROW(Global) Firmware Installation
bootstrap.embedded_restart: [*] Embedded Python detected. Restarting with embedded interpreter...
country.change_prompt: Do you want to change the country code? (y/n):
country.detecting: [*] Detecting current country code from proinfo...
country.invalid: [!] Invalid country code. It must be 2 letters.
country.menu_header: [?] Select the country code to write to proinfo.
country.no_change: [*] Country code will not be changed.
country.no_file: [!] proinfo file not found or could not be read.
country.not_detected: Could not detect country code from proinfo.
country.notice: [*] You can change the country code (for example CNXX -> KR, US, EU, etc.). Select a code from the list or enter a custom 2-letter code.
country.number_prompt: Please enter the country code you want to change:
country.patching: [*] Patching proinfo with new country code
country.selected: [*] Country code entered by the user: {name} ({code})
dl.lk_dtbo_missing_after_extract: [!] lk and dtbo image files are missing after extraction.
dl.lk_dtbo_ready: [+] lk and dtbo images are ready.
dl.lk_dtbo_skip: [*] lk and dtbo images already present. Skipping download.
dl.prc_missing_after_extract: [!] Required PRC image files are missing after extraction.
dl.skip_prc: [*] PRC images already present. Skipping download.
dl.skip_python: [*] Embedded Python already present. Skipping download.
dl.spft_downloading: [*] Downloading SPFlashToolV6.zip... (It takes about 1 to 5 minutes, please wait.)
flash.gui_started: [*] SPFlashTool has been run. Please do the proinfo backup(Readback) manually.
flow.copy_flash_done: [+] flash.xml and DA files copied for flashing.
flow.keep_data.done: [+] Global(ROW) firmware upgrade [data retention] is complete
flow.keep_data.not_global_rom: [!] The ROM installed on this device is not a Global(ROW) firmware. Please run option 1 first and then try again.
flow.keep_data.unknown_region: [!] Please check the ROM and try again.
flow.not_mtk: [!] The device is not a MediaTek AP. Please connect the correct device.
flow.platform_mismatch: [!] Platform values are different between scatter and flash.xml. Please check that they match.
flow.proinfo_copied: [+] proinfo copied to the Readback folder.
flow.wait_proinfo: [*] Waiting for proinfo to be read back...
menu.title: [LPMBox] PRC(CN) / ROW(Global) firmware auto installer
scatter.not_found: [!] image folder is missing or some files are missing. Please check that the image folder is correct.
scatter.userdata_not_found: [!] Could not find userdata partition in scatter file.
scatter.userdata_patched: [+] Userdata partition updated for keep-data mode.
scatter.lk_dtbo_copied: [+] Copied lk_a, lk_b, dtbo_a, dtbo_b to the image folder.
